protocol.name: P-GSE46741-1
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 100. ID_REF =  VALUE = MAS5.0 signal intensity DETECTION P-VALUE =

protocol.name: P-GSE46741-10
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix Scanner 3000 7G

protocol.name: P-GSE46741-2
protocol.text: Plants were either grown under continuous light and havested after 9 days under that condition, or grown under long day cycles (16 h light/ 8 h dark) and harvested every 4 hours starting 2 hours after lights on on the 9th day in that condition.

protocol.name: P-GSE46741-3
protocol.text: Seeds were sown onto MS and grown at 22ºC in continuous light or long day conditions, depending on the experiment.

protocol.name: P-GSE46741-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted with RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (QIAGEN) following the manufacturer’s protocols. To estimate the concentration and quality of samples, NanoDrop 2000c (Thermo Scientific) and Agilent 2100 Bioanalyzer (Agilent Technologies) with Agilent RNA 6000 NanoKit were employed, respectively. Libraries were prepared following the TruSeq™ RNA Sample Preparation Guide (Illumina). 3 µg of total RNA were polyA-purified, fragmented and first-strand cDNA synthesized by reverse transcriptase (SuperScript II-Invitrogen) and random hexamers. This was followed by RNA degradation and second strand cDNA synthesis. End repair process and adittion of a single ‘A’ nucleotide to the 3’ ends allowed ligation of multiple indexing adapters. Then, an enrichment step of 12 cycles of PCR was performed. Library validation included quality control and quantification.

protocol.name: P-GSE46741-5
protocol.text: 1hr white light pulse during middle of the night (CT=6) or middle of the subjective day (CT=18). Control samples were collected without light pulse treatment.

protocol.name: P-GSE46741-6
protocol.text: 15 days old plant were grown in 12/12 white light/dark cycles and then were transfered to countinuos dark free running conditions.

protocol.name: P-GSE46741-7
protocol.text: Total RNA extraction was performed using RNaeasy Mini kit system according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE46741-8
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 5 ug total RNA (Analysis Technical Manual, 2005, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE46741-9
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 15 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on Arabidopsis Genome ATH1 Array were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
